peripheralPage.name: _instance

binaryOption.name: smc_pmprot_ahsrun
binaryOption.toolTip: This write-once field allows the MCU to enter High Speed Run mode (HSRUN).

binaryOption.name: smc_pmprot_avlp
binaryOption.toolTip: This write-once bit allows the MCU to enter any very low power modes: VLPR, VLPW, and VLPS

peripheralPage.template: \t// Power Mode Protection Register \tstatic constexpr uint8_t pmprot = \t SMC_PMPROT_AHSRUN($(smc_pmprot_ahsrun:0)) | // Allow High Speed Run mode \t SMC_PMPROT_AVLP($(smc_pmprot_avlp:0)); // Allow very low power modes\n\n

choiceOption.name: smc_stopctrl_stopo
choiceOption.toolTip: These bits control whether a Partial Stop mode is entered when STOPM=STOP

choice.name: STOP1 - Partial Stop with both system and bus clocks disabled
STOP2 - Partial Stop with system clock disabled and bus clock enabled

peripheralPage.template:
\t/* smc_s32k14x.xml */ \t/** \t * Enable the given power modes. \t * A mode must be enabled before it can be entered. \t * \t * @param[in] smcVeryLowPower Allows VLPR, VLPW, and VLPS modes \t * @param[in] smcHighSpeedRun Allows HSRUN mode (if supported) \t * \t * @note This is a write-once-after-reset operation \t */ \tstatic ErrorCode enablePowerModes( \t SmcVeryLowPower smcVeryLowPower, \t SmcHighSpeedRun smcHighSpeedRun) {
\t smc().PMPROT = smcVeryLowPower|smcHighSpeedRun; \t return E_NO_ERROR; \t}\n\n

\t/* smc_s32k14x.xml */ \t/** \t * Allows the detailed operation in STOP mode to be controlled. \t * \t * @param[in] smcPartialStopMode Controls whether a Partial Stop mode is entered when STOPM=STOP \t */ \tstatic void setStopOptions( \t SmcPartialStopMode smcPartialStopMode = SmcPartialStopMode_Normal) { \t \t smc().STOPCTRL = smcPartialStopMode; \t}\n\n
\t// VLLS Control Register \tstatic constexpr uint8_t stopctrl = \t SMC_STOPCTRL_STOPO($(smc_stopctrl_stopo:0)); // Partial Stop Option\n\n
